steps: Heat the oil in a pan and fry the onion for 3-4 minutes, or until softened, then add the spinach, parsley and stock. Bring to the boil, then add the bread and lime juice and simmer for 3-4 minutes, or until the bread starts to break down.
Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and then blend until smooth with a stick blender.
Ladle the soup into a serving bowl and top with the yoghurt.
title: Bread and spinach soup
